How many have there been today?  

Zero for zero dollars.

What are your options if you’re laid off because of COVID-19?

Individuals can take up to 39 weeks of Unemployment Insurance, and the minimum weekly pay is increased to $600. This includes self-employed individuals, independent contractors (gig workers), and sole proprietors.
